= Getting started with JFlat =

== How to read a CSV file into an list of String[] ==

<verbatim>
FileReader fr = new FileReader("testdata/prices.csv");
DefaultCSVReader reader = new DefaultCSVReader(fr);
List<String[]> lines = reader.readAll();
</verbatim>
